records.location_details: Border with Greece, specifically on the Greek side of a river (likely Evros) after crossing from Turkey.
records.where_clear: Greek side of the Evros river border
records.location_text_raw: border with Greece, the river, Greek side of the river
records.uncertainty_note: Specific point on the river border not identified, but clearly on the Greek side.

possible_violations.violation_name: Confiscation of mobile phones without protocol

records.context_note: An Afghan male migrant and 11 others traveled from Istanbul to the Greek border. They crossed a river and were apprehended on the Greek side. Mobile phones were confiscated from 6 migrants without any protocol or document, leading to an alleged Fundamental Right violation report.
records.evidence_quote: While they were crossing the river, they were apprehended by Text Removed - Reporting Tools. On the Greek side of the river Text Removed - Human Resources took from migrants their mobile phones. The interviewee emphasized that he didn't want to give them phone, because it was new one. Moreover, the Text Removed - Reporting Tools took mobile phones from 6 migrants, without giving any protocol or document describing that confiscation.
